children.name:
SELECT admins.`idAdmin` AS `admins_idAdmin`, admins.email AS admins_email, admins.password AS admins_password, admins.`lastName` AS `admins_lastName`, admins.`firstName` AS `admins_firstName`, admins.`phoneNumber` AS `admins_phoneNumber`, admins.photo AS admins_photo 
FROM admins 
WHERE admins.`idAdmin` = %(pk_1)s

SELECT client.`idClient` AS `client_idClient`, client.`lastName` AS `client_lastName`, client.`firstName` AS `client_firstName`, client.email AS client_email, client.password AS client_password, client.phone AS client_phone, client.user_img AS client_user_img, client.`creationDate` AS `client_creationDate`, client.is_admin AS client_is_admin 
FROM client 
WHERE client.`idClient` = %(pk_1)s

SELECT `order`.`idOrder` AS `order_idOrder`, `order`.`idClient` AS `order_idClient`, `order`.date_order AS order_date_order, `order`.total_order AS order_total_order, `order`.`id_deliveryType` AS `order_id_deliveryType` 
FROM `order` 
WHERE `order`.`idClient` = %(idClient_1)s

SELECT delivery.`idDelivery` AS `delivery_idDelivery`, delivery.`idOrder` AS `delivery_idOrder`, delivery.status_del AS delivery_status_del, delivery.date_del AS delivery_date_del, delivery.`idAddress` AS `delivery_idAddress` 
FROM delivery 
WHERE delivery.`idAddress` IN (SELECT address.`idAddress` 
FROM address 
WHERE address.`idClient` = %(idClient_1)s)

SELECT address.`idAddress` AS `address_idAddress`, address.city AS address_city, address.country AS address_country, address.`zipCode` AS `address_zipCode`, address.details AS address_details, address.`idClient` AS `address_idClient` 
FROM address 
WHERE address.`idClient` = %(idClient_1)s
